medical_history.chief_complaint: Gradual onset of epigastric 'gnawing' pain associated with nausea and nonbilious vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began this afternoon with a 'hunger feeling' that progressed to 'gnawing discomfort' radiating to her back over several hours. The patient experienced nausea and nonbilious vomiting after trying to eat cereal.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Cardiac risk factors: Diabetes, Hypertension, Hypothyroidism. History of gallstone pancreatitis. H/o hysterectomy.
medical_history.family_history: Father died from heart problems. Sister had diabetes and CABG, sister with CHF, brother with heart problems around age 50.
